metadata.title: CVE-2024-42281 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Fix a segment issue when downgrading gso_sizeLinearize the skb when downgrading gso_size because it may trigger aBUG_ON() later when the skb is segmented as described in [1,2].
